title: Now that Brunswick county has been moved to the myrtle beach metro statistical area, from Wilmington, will there be any changes in service, tourism,etc.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/04/will-there-be-changes-in-service-or-tourism-now-that-brunswick-is-part-of-myrtle-beachs-msa/
